summary: This mod replaces the original main menu logo with 75 wallpapers taken from my own screenshot collections.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]BC6's Main Menu Replacer[/color]

==============================================================================================

REQUIRED FILES:
SKSE
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3708/?]main menu wallpaper replacer HD 1080p now with randomizer MOD by hellstorm102[/url]

==============================================================================================


INSTALLATION:
Install main menu wallpaper replacer with the randomizer(the file from hellstorm102's mod).

Download and unzip BC6wallpapers.

Place all the subfolders, from Aftermath to Winter Tree, in the mainmenuwallpapers folder in your Skyrim Data folder.
(Steam>steamapps>common>skyrim>Data>mainmenuwallpapers)

{Same instructions for the locknloll66 collection under the optional files.  Take all subfolders and place in mainmenuwallpapers of Skyrim Data folder.}

Next time you start Skyrim from SKSE you should see a new main menu wallpaper.

==============================================================================================


This mod replaces the original main menu logo with 74 wallpapers taken from my own screenshot collections.  (101 total including the wps from Hellstorm102)
After using Hellstorm's mod for so long I wanted to add some new images to my game.  I'm uploading these in case others would like to add some to their main menu collection as well.



[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00]NEW[/color][/font]: I just uploaded a collection of new wallpapers from locknloll66.  He was kind enough to give me permission to convert the images from his WallpaperS InI file ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57662/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57662/?[/url]).  His file allowed people to use his screenshots as desktop wallpapers, I converted them to dds files for use in Skyrim.  There are 220 in total, listed under the optional files of the download page.  As with my wallpapers, each folder has a jpg image labeled 1.jpg as a preview image.  If you want to see some of his shots before downloading that file, head to the link for WallpaperS InI.  It has some of his images on the page so you can get a taste.



There are a lot of users on the nexus with great screenarchery galleries that I may add to the mod in the future.  I would have to get permission from them and then take a selection of their images to convert to dds.
I will only add images after getting in contact with the author of said images.



All the folders have a jpg image so you can preview the image.  If you do not want a certain image from showing then delete that folder.


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000]LORE WARNING[/color][/font]:
Hero, Trespasser, Triple Threat, and of course Lorebreaker are not lore friendly.  I used a mod called Vaalsark-Alpha by Wolf of the azar([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13561/?]/skyrim/mods/13561/?[/url]) which added a canine race, oh yeah in Lorebreaker the character is also a cyborg so there is that too.



Please don't ask which mod an armor, hair, or face is from.  These were taken a while ago and I don't keep track of which mod I use when I take screenshots.



==============================================================================================
CREDITS:

Bethesda for making Skyrim.
Hellstorm102 for creating the randomizer. He did all the hard work, I just changed my screenshots to dds files.
locknloll66 for giving me permission to convert his awesome screenshots into dds files.
The Nexus for hosting a great site and awesome community.
author: bluechief6
